info.description: Search API is a RESTful API that allows developers to run a single line fuzzy search for addresses and POIs. Search API returns the latitude/longitude of a specific address, cross street, geographic feature, or point of interest (POI).
info.title: Search

parameters.description: Expected response format.
parameters.name: ext

parameters.description: Comma separated list of geometry UUIDs, previously retrieved from an Search API request.
parameters.name: geometries

parameters.description: Defines the precision of the geometries.
parameters.name: geometriesZoom

200.description: OK: additional data were retrieved and the body of the response contains requested data.

400.description: Bad request: one or more parameters(i.e. geometries, ext) were incorrectly specified.

403.description:
Permission, capacity, or authentication issues:
  - Forbidden
  - Not authorized
  - Account inactive
  - Account over queries per second limit
  - Account over rate limit
  - Rate limit exceeded

404.description: Not Found: the requested resource could not be found, but it may be available again in the future.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: the client used a HTTP method other than GET.

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.

504.description: Internal network connectivity issue or a request that has taken too long to complete.

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: category

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: List of geometries to filter by. Available types are CIRCLE (with the radius expressed in meters) and POLYGON.
parameters.name: geometryList

parameters.description: List of POIs to filter. The only required attribute of a POI is position, everything else is optional and will be echoed back when passed in.
parameters.example: [{"poi":{"name":"S Restaurant Toms"},"address":{"freeformAddress":"2880 Broadway, New York, NY 10025"},"position":{"lat":40.80558,"lon":-73.96548}},{"poi":{"name":"Yasha Raman Corporation"},"address":{"freeformAddress":"940 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025"},"position":{"lat":40.80076,"lon":-73.96556}}]
parameters.name: poiList

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: List of geometries to filter by. Available types are CIRCLE (with the radius expressed in meters) and POLYGON.
parameters.name: geometryList

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description:
Latitude where results should be biased.
NOTE: supplying a lat/lon without a radius will return search results biased to that point.
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description:
Longitude where results should be biased
NOTE: supplying a lat/lon without a radius will return search results biased to that point.
parameters.name: lon

parameters.description: If radius and position are set, the results will be constrained to the defined area. The radius parameter is specified in meters.
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: Top left position of the bounding box. This is specified as a comma separated string composed of lat., lon.
parameters.name: topLeft

parameters.description: Bottom right position of the bounding box. This is specified as a comma separated string composed of lat., lon.
parameters.name: btmRight

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Maximum number of cross-streets to return.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: If the "spatialKeys" flag is set, the response will also contain a proprietary geospatial keys for a specified location.
parameters.name: spatialKeys

parameters.description: The directional heading in degrees, usually similar to the course along a road segment. Entered in degrees, measured clockwise from north (so north is 0, east is 90, etc.)
parameters.name: heading

parameters.description: The maximum distance in meters from the specified position for the reverse geocoder to consider.
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: If the "spatialKeys" flag is set, the response will also contain a proprietary geospatial keys for a specified location.
parameters.name: spatialKeys

parameters.description: To enable return of the posted speed limit (where available).
parameters.name: returnSpeedLimit

parameters.description: The directional heading in degrees, usually similar to the course along a road segment. Entered in degrees, measured clockwise from north (so north is 0, east is 90, etc.)
parameters.name: heading

parameters.description: The maximum distance in meters from the specified position for the reverse geocoder to consider.
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: If a number is sent in along with the request, the response may include the side of the street (Left/Right) and an offset position for that number.
parameters.name: number

parameters.description: Enables return of the road use array for reverse geocodes at street level.
parameters.name: returnRoadUse

parameters.description: Restricts reverse geocodes to a certain type of road use. The road use array for reverse geocodes can be one or more of: ["LimitedAccess", "Arterial", "Terminal", "Ramp", "Rotary", "LocalStreet"].
parameters.name: roadUse

parameters.description: Specifies the jsonp callback method.
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: The directional heading in degrees, usually similar to the course along a road segment. Entered in degrees, measured clockwise from north (so north is 0, east is 90, etc.)
parameters.name: heading

parameters.description: List of POIs to filter. The only required attribute of a POI is position, everything else is optional and will be echoed back when passed in.
parameters.example: [{"poi":{"name":"Cleaire Advanced Emission Controls"},"address":{"freeformAddress":"7220 Trade St, San Diego, CA 92121"},"position":{"lat":"37.83274","lon":"-122.27631"}}]
parameters.name: poiList

parameters.description: The directional heading in degrees, usually similar to the course along a road segment. Entered in degrees, measured clockwise from north (so north is 0, east is 90, etc.)
parameters.name: heading

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: The directional heading in degrees, usually similar to the course along a road segment. Entered in degrees, measured clockwise from north (so north is 0, east is 90, etc.)
parameters.name: heading

parameters.description: Multiplies the limit by N to gather more candidate POIs, which will then be sorted by drive distance, returning only the top candidates according to the limit.
parameters.name: multiplier

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded. To perform a reverse geocode, the user can provide latitude and longitude coordinates directly in the query. More information can be found here.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Query string. Must be properly URL encoded.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Maximum detour time
parameters.name: maxDetourTime

btmRight.description: Bottom right position of the bounding box. This is specified as a comma separated string composed of lat., lon.
btmRight.name: btmRight

countryCode.description: 2 or 3 letter country code (e.g.: FR, ES).
countryCode.name: countryCode

countrySecondarySubdivision.description: The county for the structured address.
countrySecondarySubdivision.name: countrySecondarySubdivision

countrySet.description: Comma separated string of country codes. This will limit the search to the specified countries.
countrySet.name: countrySet

countrySubdivision.description: The state or province for the structured address.
countrySubdivision.name: countrySubdivision

countryTertiarySubdivision.description: The named area for the structured address.
countryTertiarySubdivision.name: countryTertiarySubdivision

crossStreet.description: The cross street name for the structured address.
crossStreet.name: crossStreet

extendedPostalCodesFor.description: Indexes for which extended postal codes should be included in the results. Available indexes are: - Addr = Address ranges - Geo = Geographies - PAD = Point Addresses - POI = Points of Interest - Str = Streets - XStr = Cross Streets (intersections)
extendedPostalCodesFor.name: extendedPostalCodesFor

idxSet.description: A comma separated list of indexes which should be utilized for the search. Item order does not matter. Available indexes are: - Addr = Address range interpolation (when there is no PAD) - Geo = Geographies - PAD = Point Addresses - POI = Points of interest - Str = Streets - Xstr = Cross Streets (intersections)
idxSet.name: idxSet

language.description: Language in which search results should be returned. Should be one of supported IETF language tags, case insensitive.
language.name: language

lat.description:
Latitude where results should be biased.
NOTE: supplying a lat/lon without a radius will return search results biased to that point.
lat.name: lat

limit.description: Maximum number of search results that will be returned.
limit.name: limit

lon.description:
Longitude where results should be biased
NOTE: supplying a lat/lon without a radius will return search results biased to that point.
lon.name: lon

maxFuzzyLevel.description: Maximum fuzziness level to be used.
maxFuzzyLevel.name: maxFuzzyLevel

minFuzzyLevel.description: Minimum fuzziness level to be used.
minFuzzyLevel.name: minFuzzyLevel

municipality.description: The municipality (city/town) for the structured address.
municipality.name: municipality

municipalitySubdivision.description: The municipality subdivision (sub/super city) for the structured address.
municipalitySubdivision.name: municipalitySubdivision

ofs.description: Starting offset of the returned results within the full result set.
ofs.name: ofs

position.description: This is specified as a comma separated string composed of lat., lon.
position.name: position

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code for the structured address.
postalCode.name: postalCode

radius.description: If radius and position are set, the results will be constrained to the defined area. The radius parameter is specified in meters.
radius.name: radius

routingTimeout.description: Only return results that arrive from routing engine within this time limit.
routingTimeout.name: routingTimeout

storeResult.description: If the "storeResult" flag is set, the query will be interpreted as a stored geocode and will be billed according to the terms of use.
storeResult.name: storeResult

streetName.description: The street name for the structured address.
streetName.name: streetName

streetNumber.description: The street number for the structured address.
streetNumber.name: streetNumber

topLeft.description: Top left position of the bounding box. This is specified as a comma separated string composed of lat., lon.
topLeft.name: topLeft

typeahead.description: If the "typeahead" flag is set, the query will be interpreted as a partial input and the search will enter predictive mode.
typeahead.name: typeahead

versionNumber.description: Service version number. The current value is 2.
versionNumber.name: versionNumber

200.description: OK: the search successfully returned zero or more results.

400.description: Bad Request: one or more parameters were incorrectly specified.

403.description:
Forbidden: possible causes include:
  - Service requires SSL
  - Not authorized
  - Rate or volume limit exceeded
  - Unknown referer

405.description: Method Not Allowed: the HTTP method (GET, POST, etc) is not supported for this request.

404596.description: Not Found: the HTTP request method (GET, POST, etc) or path is incorrect.

5xx.description: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
